head.title: J. J. Knowlton, John E. Lopez-Ona

hedline.hl1: J. J. Knowlton, John E. Lopez-Ona

block.p: Jacqueline Joan Knowlton, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Robert K. Knowlton of Paradise Valley, Ariz., was married yesterday to John Emil Lopez-Ona, a son of Mr. and Mrs. John V. Lopez-Ona of West Palm Beach, Fla. The Rev. Les Hoffmann, a Lutheran minister, performed the ceremony at the Arizona Biltmore, a hotel in Phoenix.

Mrs. Lopez-Ona, 31, is a director of operations and planning for the K-III Communications Corporation, the publishing company in New York. She graduated summa cum laude from Colorado College and received an M.B.A. from Harvard University. Her father owns Firebird Foods, brokers in Scottsdale, Ariz.

Jacqueline Joan Knowlton, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Robert K. Knowlton of Paradise Valley, Ariz., was married yesterday to John Emil Lopez-Ona, a son of Mr. and Mrs. John V. Lopez-Ona of West Palm Beach, Fla. The Rev. Les Hoffmann, a Lutheran minister, performed the ceremony at the Arizona Biltmore, a hotel in Phoenix.

Mrs. Lopez-Ona, 31, is a director of operations and planning for the K-III Communications Corporation, the publishing company in New York. She graduated summa cum laude from Colorado College and received an M.B.A. from Harvard University. Her father owns Firebird Foods, brokers in Scottsdale, Ariz.

Mr. Lopez-Ona, 37, graduated from Franklin & Marshall College and received an M.B.A. from the University of Pennsylvania. His father is the vice president of Flo-Sun Inc., a sugar producer with headquarters in West Palm Beach. WEDDINGS
